title: Basic Bitch Quickie Weekly Roundup - March 7th
itunes:title: Basic Bitch Quickie Weekly Roundup - March 7th
itunes:subtitle: Kim & Kayne Update, Netflix & Spotify pull Russian Content off platform, and TikTok drama with Modern Warrior & Chelsea Hart
description:
This week we're talking through a wide range of topics, from our usual Kim & Kayne weekly update to the new Tik Tok influencer drama. See below for the topics of the week:


  • Kim Kardashian Declared Legally Single in Divorce Proceedings with Kayne West 
  • Kayne West Posts Animated Video Portraying Pete Davidson Being Kidnapped, Buried 
  • Netflix Pauses All Projects, Acquisitions from Russia + Spotify Shutters Russie Office, Removes All RT & Sputnik Content
  • Tik Tok Influencer Drama - Chelsea Hart & Modern Warrior (Lance Tsosie)


Though the world has been a bit bleek recently we hope you can still walk away from our updates this week smiling with your basic and brainy friends :)



Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
